message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand you're looking to negotiate a lower price, but I have to ensure I get a fair deal for the product. Considering its value to you is $12000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
